name: 2kg Red Beef
description: Tender and fresh red beef, sourced from high-quality farms, ideal for cooking hearty meals and stews.

name: Tomatoes
description: Juicy organic tomatoes, hand-picked, great for stews, salads, sauces, and various culinary delights.

name: 4kg Fresh Shrimps
description: Premium quality shrimps, freshly caught and perfect for seafood dishes, stir-fries, and pasta recipes.

name: 6kg Spiced Crabs
description: Spiced and ready-to-cook crabs, freshly sourced, perfect for seafood lovers who enjoy rich flavors.

name: Fresh Fish
description: Freshly caught fish, rich in omega-3 fatty acids, great for a healthy diet and delicious meal preparations.

name: Milk
description: Rich and creamy milk, sourced from organic dairy farms, perfect for a nutritious diet, cereals, and beverages.

name: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, made from ripe oranges, full of vitamin C, and perfect for a refreshing drink.

name: Apples
description: Crisp and sweet apples, freshly harvested, great for snacks, juices, and various desserts.

name: Strawberries
description: Fresh and juicy strawberries, hand-picked and perfect for desserts, smoothies, and fruit salads.

name: Cheese
description: Rich and creamy cheese, aged to perfection, great for sandwiches, pasta, and gourmet dishes.

name: Almonds
description: Crunchy and delicious almonds, packed with protein, fiber, and healthy fats. A perfect snack for a healthy lifestyle and great for baking or adding to meals.

name: Bell Pepper
description: Fresh, colorful bell peppers that add a crisp texture and sweet flavor to salads, stir-fries, and sauces. Loaded with vitamins and antioxidants.

name: Broccoli
description: Nutritious and fresh broccoli, rich in fiber and vitamins. Perfect for steaming, roasting, or stir-frying to create healthy and tasty dishes.

name: Butter
description: Smooth and creamy butter, made from high-quality dairy. Ideal for baking, spreading on toast, or enhancing the flavor of your favorite dishes.

name: Eggs
description: Fresh, farm-raised eggs that are rich in protein and essential nutrients. Perfect for breakfast, baking, or cooking a variety of meals.

name: Mango
description: Sweet and juicy mangoes, packed with tropical flavor and nutrients. Great for smoothies, desserts, or simply enjoying fresh.

name: Pineapples
description: Fresh and ripe pineapples, bursting with tropical sweetness and vitamin C. Excellent for juicing, fruit salads, or snacking.

name: Bread
description: Soft, fresh bread baked to perfection. Ideal for sandwiches, toast, or serving as a side with your favorite meals.

name: Cabbage
description: Crisp and fresh cabbage, rich in vitamins and fiber. Perfect for salads, stir-fries, or making delicious coleslaw.

name: Chocolate
description: Rich and creamy chocolate, made from the finest cocoa beans. A delightful treat for snacking, baking, or gifting.

name: Cucumber
description: Fresh and crunchy cucumbers, perfect for salads, sandwiches, or refreshing drinks. High in water content and great for hydration.
